title: Tri (GOG)
description:
Hey guys, here Tri. No extras are included. Srry. Hope you guys enjoy and please help seed.


-------------------


Prepare for a mind-bending first-person adventure as you enter the world of the Odd Gods and discover the magical power of the TRI! Hunt for mystical totems and master a wide range of fantastic abilities, creating your own path through the immersive universe of TRI, now available for PC, Mac and Linux.

With every twist of a corridor, every raised gantry over your head, every new floor of towers and dungeons in the Odd GodsÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ world, TRI challenges you to think outside the box. By placing anchor points on the walls around you, youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll create triangular platforms Ã¢â‚¬â€œ the TRI of the title Ã¢â‚¬â€œ which can be climbed on, walked over and otherwise employed to negotiate the levels ahead. TheyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll help you solve puzzles, climb otherwise impossible ascents, reflect light beams and even walk up wallsÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ once you discover how to do it, that is!

A real test of spatial awareness, TRI is a mix of first-person and puzzle gameplay thatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll push your mind to the absolute limit! 


    
* The Power Of TRI Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Create your own path through each level by conjuring triangles out of thin air, then use them to solve puzzles scattered throughout the world of the Odd Gods.
    
* Go Anywhere, Everywhere Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Careful planning and thought can see you go almost anywhere using TRIs; think about where you place them and hunt for the mystical fox totems that allow you to move on!
    
* New Abilities Ã¢â‚¬â€œ ThereÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s always something new to learn, always a new power to be earned. Want to walk on walls? Redirect light beams? Use teleportation? ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s all waiting to be discovered!
